Title: Pokemon: Pikachu no Fuyuyasumi (2001)
Description: ["Pikachu's Winter Vacations are three series of videos, each composed of several Pikachu shorts. All shorts deal with winter and Christmas. This is the third and last series and contains Delibird's Dilemma, Snorlax Snowman & Trouble in Big Town."]
Related: ['Parent story: Pokemon', 'Prequel: Pokemon: Pikachu no Fuyuyasumi (2000)']
Voices: ['Ootani, Ikue', 'Inuyama, Inuko', 'Koorogi, Satomi', 'Ueda, Yuuji', 'Takashima, Gara', 'Ishimori, Takkou']
Staff: [['Yuyama, Kunihiko', 'Director'], ['Asada, Yuuji', 'Episode Director'], ['Tajiri, Satoshi', 'Original Creator'], ['Sugimori, Ken', 'Original Character Design']]
